info.name: Google - New TopNavBar - Ntm Style
info.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

I made this Script with 2 points in my mind...
- 1st = As a complement for various of my other scripts where i had this very same code.
- 2nd = Try to put the newest Google top nav bar much more smaller in all the places where it appears.

Notes:
The 1st point it will be 100% satisfied in time!
The 2nd point i can't verify with 100% certain... If your domain is not covered please report-it to me in the discussions and i will try to add it in the next update.

--- Screens taken with (v0.100) ---

{
/* complete line > SMALLER */
#gb, #gbx3, #gbx4, .gbzt, .gbgt {
	height: 16px !important;
}
SPAN.gbts {
	margin-top: -7px !important;
	padding-left: 1px !important;
	padding-right: 2px !important;
	font-size: 90% !important;
}
DIV.nH.oy8Mbf.qp {
	margin-bottom: -1px !important;
}
/* SignIn button > fix */
SPAN#gbi4s1 {
	position: absolute !important;
	top: -4px !important;
	right: 2px !important;
}
/* ProfileImg button > small-it */
SPAN#gbgs4 {
	margin-left: -3px !important;
	top: 4px !important;
}
IMG#gbi4i {
	width: 16px !important;
	height: 16px !important;
}
/* Share button > small-it+ */
SPAN.gbgsb, SPAN.gbgsca, SPAN.gbgscb {
	height: 18px !important;
}
/* Notifications button > small-it+ */
SPAN#gbi1a {
	height: 18px !important;
	margin-right: -2px !important
}
}
